body.name: Colgate Gum Expert Ultra Soft Gum Toothbrush Pack, Extra Soft Toothbrush for Gum Bleeding and Irritation, Helps Deep Clean Along Gum Line, 2 Pack

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 9 mins
features: Includes two (2) Colgate Gum Expert Ultra Soft Toothbrushes, Extra Soft Toothbrushes for Adults
Extra soft toothbrush bristles designed to minimize irritation and help reduce gum bleeding when brushing** (**vs an ordinary flat trim toothbrush)
High density tapered bristles gently remove plaque along the gum line to help maintain healthy gums
Colgate Gum Expert Ultra Soft Toothbrush features 6000 ultra soft tapered bristles to help you remove plaque effectively
This ultra soft gum toothbrush pack offers a 3X reduction in gum bleeding* (*vs an ordinary flat trim toothbrush after 12 weeks of use)
Designed to gently hug the gumline and reduce pressure
body.description: Reduce gum bleeding with the Colgate Gum Expert Ultra Soft Toothbrush. This extra soft toothbrush pack offers a gentle yet effective clean and is designed to reduce gum bleeding and minimize irritation. Among patients in the U.S., there is a 34% incidence of those suffering from gum problems***. The Colgate Gum Expert Ultra Soft Manual Toothbrush is carefully designed to gently hug the gumline and minimize irritation when brushing. Designed by dental experts, this super soft toothbrush offers a 3X reduction in gum bleeding*. Plus, the gum toothbrush features 6,000 tapered bristles that gently remove plaque. The finely crafted ultra soft bristles help you effectively remove plaque. The Colgate Gum Expert Extra Soft Bristle Toothbrush offers a 6X better reach for deep cleaning along the gum line**. Enjoy a gentle brushing experience with the Colgate Gum Expert Manual Toothbrush. *vs an ordinary flat trim toothbrush after 12 weeks of use **vs an ordinary flat trim toothbrush ***According to Global Oral Care Indications Study, 2022/Kantar Household panel TP penetration FY2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If your gums are sensitive due to your dentures, this toothbrush is the best choice.
reviews.reviewText: Colgate has created a product that is made specifically for people who have sensitive gums and dentures. This tooth brush achieves a high level of cleanliness by gently massaging your gum line without causing bleeding or soreness.Within a few weeks, my gums had improved, and I am confident that this toothbrush is a great choice for those who have dentures. Thank you Colgate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tooth brush
reviews.reviewText: Love the many soft bristles. Feels so good on my sensitive gums. Cleans very well too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Healing to your gums and tongue
reviews.reviewText: So glad I found these. My gums are healing finally because this brush is just a soft massage still cleans your teeth. Instead of a tongue brush I am now using this on my tongue and it is all so much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly an exceptional analog toothbrush!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize an extra soft toothbrush could clean more effectively than Sonicare. But it excels at the cleaning with zero pain and no bleeding gums. I've been dealing with receding gums for years now and didn't realize how much damage the Sonicare had been doing to them. As long as Colgate keeps making this toothbrush - this will be my go to! Ergonomic handle, well designed bristles, minimal design A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Toothbrushes and will reorder.
reviews.reviewText: Only two sold at a time in packaging so I replace and keep teeth cleaner with these kind of toothbrushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Colgate Gum Expert Ultra Soft Toothbrush is available in a 2-pack, providing users with two toothbrushes for their oral care needs. The "Ultra Soft" designation suggests that the toothbrush bristles are designed to be particularly gentle on the gums.An ultra-soft toothbrush is often recommended for individuals with sensitive gums or those prone to gum irritation. The two-pack offers convenience, allowing users to have a spare toothbrush or share with a family member.When using an ultra-soft toothbrush, individuals should still ensure proper brushing techniques, including gentle but thorough cleaning of teeth and gums. Regular replacement of toothbrushes, typically every three to four months, is also important for maintaining optimal oral hygiene.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So happy. These are perfect in every way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable enough for sensitive gums
reviews.reviewText: These toothbrushes are quite good for use around the gum line, as they're not too abrasive but do get the job done re: plaque removal on a day to day basis. I don't know that I would use them every day otherwise, as I prefer just slightly more stiffness in bristles for everyday, but if your gums are sensitive this is a reasonable way to go, I didn't bleed once with these.
